## Vector 1 Examples
```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)

class(vec_1) # numeric
typeof(vec_1) # double
vec_1[3]

vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]

vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1)

vec_1_char
```

## Vector 2 Examples
```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", 
           location = "Rincon", 
           swell = "south")
vec_2
length(vec_2) # 3
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]

df_1 <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "A", "D"),
                   species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "grey whale"),
                   count = c("12", "2", "36", "6"))
class(df_1)
class(df_1$species)
max_count <- df_1$count
```
